unnormalised: Good news for all you aspiring "Surya Mitras" in India! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is still offering some pretty sweet subsidies on solar rooftop installations. Think free electricity and a smaller carbon footprint - what's not to love?
normalised: Good news for all you aspiring "Surya Mitras" in India! The Ministry of N R E is still offering some pretty sweet subsidies on solar rooftop installations. Think free electricity and a smaller carbon footprint - what's not to love?

unnormalised: Turns out, applications are still open in many states like Tamil Nadu and Gujarat. You could potentially save a significant chunk of change on those initial installation costs. We're talking potentially Rs. 30,000 or more depending on your system size (upto 3kW) and the state scheme.
normalised: Turns out, applications are still open in many states like Tamil Nadu and Gujarat. You could potentially save a significant chunk of change on those initial installation costs. We're talking potentially rupee thirty thousand or more depending on your system size up to three kilowatt and the state scheme.

unnormalised: Imagine powering your entire house with sunshine, just in time for Diwali celebrations! You can use those electricity savings to buy extra sweets, maybe even splurge on some amazing biryani for the family gathering.
normalised: Imagine powering your entire house with sunshine, just in time for Diwali celebrations! You can use those electricity savings to buy extra sweets, maybe even splurge on some amazing biryani for the family gathering.

unnormalised: The process might seem a little daunting at first, but there are plenty of helpful guides online from institutions like IIT Madras. Plus, your local electricity distribution company (Discom) can also help navigate the paperwork.
normalised: The process might seem a little daunting at first, but there are plenty of helpful guides online from institutions like I I T Madras. Plus, your local electricity distribution company D-I-S-C-O-M can also help navigate the paperwork.

unnormalised: Don't wait too long though! These subsidies are often available on a "first come, first served" basis, and you wouldn't want to miss out. Time to go solar, folks! Think of all the extra money you'll have for Onam next year.
normalised: Don't wait too long though! These subsidies are often available on a "first come, first served" basis, and you wouldn't want to miss out. Time to go solar, folks! Think of all the extra money you'll have for Onam next year.
